meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>punish</kanji> <kanji>task</kanji> <kanji>facility</kanji> is the place you go to do your punishment tasks. It is a <vocabulary>jail</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>prison</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
